testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlOrganizationInformationRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.2 [Need to Provide Information on Organizations, Centers, and Contacts] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R26_Organization_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R26_Organization_Name_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Location is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R27_Organization_Location_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R27_Organization_Location_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Function Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R28_Organization_Function_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R28_Organization_Function_Description_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Contact Information (ContactInformation) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R29_Organization_Contact_Information__ContactInformation__Supported = ${TMDD_N4R29_Organization_Contact_Information__ContactInformation__Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Required Organization Contact Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R30_Required_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R30_Required_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Contact Person Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R31_Contact_Person_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R31_Contact_Person_Name_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Contact Person Role is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R32_Contact_Person_Role_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R32_Contact_Person_Role_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Work Phone Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R33_Work_Phone_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R33_Work_Phone_Number_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Alternate Phone Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R34_Alternate_Phone_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R34_Alternate_Phone_Number_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Cellular Phone Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R35_Cellular_Phone_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R35_Cellular_Phone_Number_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Cellular Phone Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R36_Cellular_Phone_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R36_Cellular_Phone_Identifier_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Fax Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R37_Fax_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R37_Fax_Number_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pager Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R38_Pager_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R38_Pager_Number_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pager Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R39_Pager_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R39_Pager_Identifier_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Internet E-Mail Address is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R40_Internet_E_Mail_Address_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R40_Internet_E_Mail_Address_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Radio Unit Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R41_Radio_Unit_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R41_Radio_Unit_Identifier_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Line 1 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R42_Mailing_Address_Line_1_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R42_Mailing_Address_Line_1_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Line 2 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R43_Mailing_Address_Line_2_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R43_Mailing_Address_Line_2_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address City is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R44_Mailing_Address_City_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R44_Mailing_Address_City_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address State is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R45_Mailing_Address_State_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R45_Mailing_Address_State_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Zip Code is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R46_Mailing_Address_Zip_Code_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R46_Mailing_Address_Zip_Code_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Country is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.17). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R47_Mailing_Address_Country_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R47_Mailing_Address_Country_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Information (CenterInformation) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R48_Organization_Center_Information__CenterInformation__Supported = ${TMDD_N4R48_Organization_Center_Information__CenterInformation__Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Required Organization Center Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R49_Required_Organization_Center_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R49_Required_Organization_Center_Information_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R50_Organization_Center_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R50_Organization_Center_Name_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Location is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R51_Organization_Center_Location_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R51_Organization_Center_Location_Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R52_Organization_Center_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R52_Organization_Center_Description_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R53_Organization_Center_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R53_Organization_Center_Type_Supported}

Step 30 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Contact Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R54_Organization_Center_Contact_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R54_Organization_Center_Contact_Information_Supported}

Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Date and Time Change Information - Organization Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R55_Date_and_Time_Change_Information___Organization_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R55_Date_and_Time_Change_Information___Organization_Information_Supported}
Step 32 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 33 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 34 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 35 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N4R15_Send_Organization_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected
Step 36 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.1 VERIFY that element organizationInformationMsg exists.
Step 36.2 VERIFY that element organization-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 36.3 IF TMDD_N4R26_Organization_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.3.1 VERIFY that element organization-name exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 36.4 IF TMDD_N4R27_Organization_Location_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.4.1 VERIFY that element organization-location exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 36.5 IF TMDD_N4R28_Organization_Function_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.5.1 VERIFY that element organization-function exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 36.6 IF TMDD_N4R29_Organization_Contact_Information__ContactInformation__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.6.1 VERIFY that element organization-contact-details exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 36.7 IF TMDD_N4R30_Required_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.7.1 VERIFY that element contact-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.8 IF TMDD_N4R31_Contact_Person_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.8.1 VERIFY that element person-name exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.9 IF TMDD_N4R32_Contact_Person_Role_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.9.1 VERIFY that element person-title exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.10 IF TMDD_N4R33_Work_Phone_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.10.1 VERIFY that element phone-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.11 IF TMDD_N4R34_Alternate_Phone_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.11.1 VERIFY that element phone-alternate exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.12 IF TMDD_N4R35_Cellular_Phone_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.12.1 VERIFY that element mobile-phone-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.13 IF TMDD_N4R36_Cellular_Phone_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.13.1 VERIFY that element mobile-phone-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.14 IF TMDD_N4R37_Fax_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.14.1 VERIFY that element fax-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.15 IF TMDD_N4R38_Pager_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.15.1 VERIFY that element pager-number exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.16 IF TMDD_N4R39_Pager_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.16.1 VERIFY that element pager-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.17 IF TMDD_N4R40_Internet_E_Mail_Address_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.17.1 VERIFY that element email-address exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.18 IF TMDD_N4R41_Radio_Unit_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.18.1 VERIFY that element radio-unit exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.19 IF TMDD_N4R42_Mailing_Address_Line_1_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.19.1 VERIFY that element address-line1 exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.20 IF TMDD_N4R43_Mailing_Address_Line_2_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.20.1 VERIFY that element address-line2 exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.21 IF TMDD_N4R44_Mailing_Address_City_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.21.1 VERIFY that element city exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.22 IF TMDD_N4R45_Mailing_Address_State_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.22.1 VERIFY that element state exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.23 IF TMDD_N4R46_Mailing_Address_Zip_Code_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.23.1 VERIFY that element zip-code exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.24 IF TMDD_N4R47_Mailing_Address_Country_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.24.1 VERIFY that element country exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 36.25 IF TMDD_N4R48_Organization_Center_Information__CenterInformation__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.25.1 VERIFY that element center-contact-list exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 36.26 IF TMDD_N4R49_Required_Organization_Center_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.26.1 VERIFY that element center-id exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 36.27 IF TMDD_N4R50_Organization_Center_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.27.1 VERIFY that element center-name exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 36.28 IF TMDD_N4R51_Organization_Center_Location_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.28.1 VERIFY that element center-location exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 36.29 IF TMDD_N4R52_Organization_Center_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.29.1 VERIFY that element center-description exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 36.30 IF TMDD_N4R53_Organization_Center_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.30.1 VERIFY that element center-type exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 36.31 IF TMDD_N4R54_Organization_Center_Contact_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.31.1 VERIFY that element center-contact-details exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 36.32 IF TMDD_N4R55_Date_and_Time_Change_Information___Organization_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 36.32.1 VERIFY that element last-update-time exists within each instance of organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 36.33 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content
